price: Nokorε sε, εberε a nsuo no yiriiε (wͻ Noa pεn soͻ) no, Yεde motenaa nsuo mu hyεn mu,
arabic: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلۡمَآءُ حَمَلۡنَٰكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡجَارِيَةِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innā lammā ṭaghā al-māu ḥamalnākum fī al-jāriyati
